mapper.select: SELECT #{registerDate} AS `count_date`, #{serverId} AS `server_id`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `game_player` WHERE `server_id` = #{serverId} AND `create_time` >= #{registerDate} AND `create_time` < DATE_ADD(#{registerDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS register_num, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(o.`player_id`)) FROM `game_order` o LEFT JOIN `game_player` p ON o.`player_id` = p.`player_id` WHERE p.`create_time` >= #{registerDate} AND p.`create_time` < DATE_ADD(#{registerDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND o.`pay_time` >= #{registerDate} AND o.`pay_time` < DATE_ADD(#{registerDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND o.`server_id` = #{serverId}) AS `pay_num`

SELECT #{serverId} AS serverId, #{days} AS days, #{registerDate} AS registerDate, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT( l.`player_id` )) FROM ${logDb}.`log_account` l LEFT JOIN `game_player` p ON l.`player_id` = p.`player_id` WHERE l.`server_id` = #{serverId} AND l.`type` = 2 AND l.`create_date` = DATE(DATE_ADD( #{registerDate}, INTERVAL #{days} DAY )) AND p.`create_time` >= #{registerDate} AND p.`create_time` < DATE_ADD(#{registerDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS remain
